---

title: "Delete a user's passkey"
description: "This endpoint allows a user to delete a specific passkey by its ID. The user must be authenticated and authorized to perform this action."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a user's passkey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/user/passkeys/{id}/delete/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows a user to delete a specific passkey by its ID. The user must be authenticated and authorized to perform this action.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200}}}}}},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"unauthorized":{"value":{"statusCode":401,"error":"Unauthorized","message":"You are not logged in"}}}}}},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"notFound":{"value":{"statusCode":404,"error":"Not found","message":"Passkey not found"}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal server error","error":"Internal server error"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
